paper_abstract: In this paper we study the global solvability and existence of self-similar solutions to a generalized Davey-Stewartson system. We first use the Banach fixed point theorem to establish a general global existence theorem. By using this general result to a class of special initial data we obtain the existence of global self-similar solutions. (c) 2009 Elsevier Ltd. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Self-similar solutions to a generalized Davey-Stewartson system
